医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究将表观遗传机制与胎盘血管发育联系起来如果胎盘血管发育受损，可能会导致胎儿生长迟缓。德国癌症研究中心 (DKFZ) 和海德堡大学曼海姆医学院的科学家发现，小鼠胎盘中功能性血管的正确发育是受表观遗传控制的：其中一种利用甲基改变基因活性的酶负责。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-links-epigenic-mechanism-to-placental-blood-vessel-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-links-epigenic-mechanism-to-placental-blood-vessel-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65704776-b48c-43ee-b2dc-c5f54044894a Wed, 15 Jan 2025 11:17:22 -0500 Study links epigenetic mechanism to placental blood vessel development
研究强调韩国老年人食用猪肉的好处新研究强调了猪肉消费在支持韩国老年人饮食和肌肉健康方面的潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-highlights-benefits-of-pork-conspiration-for-older-adults-in-South-Korea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-highlights-benefits-of-pork-conspiration-for-older-adults-in-South-Korea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f003e98d-ad8a-4709-bd91-b37f86f7b4f9 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 11:13:05 -0500 Study highlights benefits of pork consumption for older adults in South Korea
索马鲁肽通过自动胰岛素输送改善血糖控制索马鲁肽与自动胰岛素输送相结合可增强 1 型糖尿病的血糖控制，降低胰岛素需求并帮助体重管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Semaglutide-improves-glycemic-control-with-automated-insulin-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Semaglutide-improves-glycemic-control-with-automated-insulin-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f841e89-db52-43b0-8a5e-0961feba6f2a Wed, 15 Jan 2025 10:52:00 -0500 Semaglutide improves glycemic control with automated insulin delivery
生活方式支持有望减少慢性背痛残疾腰痛是全世界残疾的主要原因，许多治疗方法（例如药物治疗）往往无法提供持久的缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Lifestyle-support-shows-promise-in-reducing-chronic-back-pain-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Lifestyle-support-shows-promise-in-reducing-chronic-back-pain-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3256e38-a082-4f47-9e1e-6dad930a5c29 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 09:16:44 -0500 Lifestyle support shows promise in reducing chronic back pain disability
胰腺癌见解：pORG 分类如何预测生存并指导治疗研究人员确定了影响转移性胰腺导管腺癌患者预后的独特分子和免疫特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pancreatic-cancer-insights-How-pORG-classifications-predict-survival-and-guide-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pancreatic-cancer-insights-How-pORG-classifications-predict-survival-and-guide-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7196e64-b383-48fe-a846-fd25b94c6f89 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:58:00 -0500 Pancreatic cancer insights: How pORG classifications predict survival and guide treatment
新型材料有望治疗多发性骨髓瘤骨病变该团队解决了治疗多发性骨髓瘤（一种血癌）的关键挑战，恶性浆细胞在骨髓中积聚，导致 80% 的患者出现衰弱性骨病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Novel-materials-show-promise-in-treating-multiple-myeloma-bone-lesions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Novel-materials-show-promise-in-treating-multiple-myeloma-bone-lesions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23c969b6-b402-4f71-ab9c-0bc77cce719d Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:45:15 -0500 Novel materials show promise in treating multiple myeloma bone lesions
Aurox 将业务拓展至北美Aurox 将业务拓展至北美https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Aurox-expands-activity-into-North-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Aurox-expands-activity-into-North-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3445cda2-44e3-4d05-82e0-fe1135308fcf Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:39:00 -0500 Aurox expands activity into North America
Spear Bio 的新型 pTau 217 血液测试获得 FDA 突破性设备指定，为早期阿尔茨海默病诊断提供可扩展的解决方案Spear Bio Inc. 是一家开创下一代超灵敏免疫分析技术的生物技术公司，今天宣布其 pTau 217 血液检测已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 的突破性设备称号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Spear-Bio-secures-FDA-breakthrough-device-designation-for-its-novel-pTau-217-blood-test-advancing-scalable-solutions-早期阿尔茨海默病诊断.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Spear-Bio-secures-FDA-breakthrough-device-designation-for-its-novel-pTau-217-blood-test-advancing-scalable-solutions-早期阿尔茨海默病诊断.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc805735-dc26-4e30-a2db-3ac6b6f41d6d Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:36:00 -0500 Spear Bio secures FDA breakthrough device designation for its novel pTau 217 blood test, advancing scalable solutions for early Alzheimer's disease diagnosis
CN Bio与Primetech Corporation签署战略合作伙伴关系，建立OOC解决方案在日本的分销渠道CN Bio 是加速药物发现和开发工作流程的片上器官 (OOC) 系统和解决方案的领先供应商，今天宣布已与日本生命科学研究设备分销商 Primetech 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CN-Bio-signs-strategic-partnership-with-Primetech-Corporation-to-built-distribution-channel-for-OOC-solutions-in-Japan。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CN-Bio-signs-strategic-partnership-with-Primetech-Corporation-to-built-distribution-channel-for-OOC-solutions-in-Japan。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f0c23dc-0feb-450d-8907-7b7446b10c59 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:25:00 -0500 CN Bio signs strategic partnership with Primetech Corporation to establish distribution channel for OOC solutions in Japan
与 SARS-CoV-2 感染易感性增加相关的遗传风险因素研究人员发现了 SARS-CoV-2 感染的一种新的遗传风险因素，为了解该病毒侵入人类细胞的能力提供了新的见解。 SARS-CoV-2 是传播 COVID-19 的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Genetic-risk-factor-linked-to-increased-susceptibility-to-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Genetic-risk-factor-linked-to-increased-susceptibility-to-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=715e71fd-944b-48bd-8c29-ba03f5e9a337 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:20:36 -0500 Genetic risk factor linked to increased susceptibility to SARS-CoV-2 infection
